TEXT.ABOUT: Fintracker is a project created to track your cash flow. Record your expenses and analyze the provided statistics. Divide expenses into categories and filter the displayed list in a way that suits you.
TEXT.ABOUT_WARNING: Attention! The project was created for educational purposes only. Using the provided services, you confirm that Fintracker is not responsible for the safety of the data you entered, and you are aware of the possibility of leakage or damage to this data.
